### Step 1: Creating the package

```{r}
library(devtools)
library(roxygen2)
library(usethis)
library(lubridate)

path <- file.path('C:/Users/butlea19/OneDrive - Centrica/Documents', "DEr")
create_package(path)
#or
create_package("DEr")
```

### Step 2: Adding Functions

```{r}
use_r("DE_functions")
```

Try function

```{r}
ImportPeaceData(StartTime = '2018-12-01')
```

### Step 3: Adding Function Documentation

```{r}

```

```{r}
document()
```

